recipesJson.name: Lake Effect
recipesJson.author: Ilbvaping
recipesJson.description: Nice cooling menthol shake and vape. Good on a hot summer day.

reviews.text: It's very good... I think/thought the Arctic winter at 10 percent was /is a little high but it's very cool and tasty thanks!  I say was/is because I'm gonna try it was little lower I think it will still have the same effect.. Or did you try?
